title: Why are the downtown streets in Wilmington named exactly of those in  downtown Philadelphia?  Of course, Main St and others obvious but it goes on and on Water, Chestnut, Walnut, etc.  I\'ve never been to Philadelphia but picked up on this when reading Ben Frankilin\'s autobio. Do the Copper Penny owners know being Philly fanatics?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=19019
